hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Carpenters' tent#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Goron City#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
